author: Trott
message:
tools: update markdown linter

Update remark-preset-lint-node to 1.4.0. This adds `End-Of-Life` as a
prohibited string, favoring `End-of-Life` for consistency.

Refs: https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/26251
